attributes.action: set a permanent day of the year for the Easter holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currenlty the Vatican determines which week of the year the British Easter Holiday is held. This can fluctuate quite widely and disrupts planning for school terms, and for industries which rely on a scheduled working calendar. 
Setting a permanent date will take this part of our National Life back into our own control, and give educationalists and industry planners a set yearly calendar.
